name: Moskitto Bar
description:
A fresh and unique sound which combines a beautiful and original mix of Ukrainian, Balkan, Iraqi Middle-Eastern and French Celtic music. 

The project was initiated by Tangi Ropars when he met newcomers Yura, from Ukraine, and Ahmed, from Iraq.  In June 2016, during a gathering in Northern Ontario, they met every day in the woods to share and teach each other their respective melodies and rhythms. As they were playing, the rural Ontario mosquitos, were joyfully feasting on the multicultural group inspiring their eponymous name. 

Almost two years later, the trio connected with the notable violin player, Fethi Nadjem freshly landed for Algeria, adding his oriental flavour to the sound mix.

More than the music, despite their diverse traditions, political and social stories, they share a deeper connection, a mutual love and respect for each other and a common desire to spread messages of unity.

name: Moving Between
description:
Enjoy a concert line-up of original compositions by RAW members and collaborators!

This show uses drums, dance, and storytelling to animate memories of transformation, how we make our lives between perception and experience, in cycles of holding and breathing, in social and cultural entanglements, and across our generous range of feeling. 

Resonating at a frequency between our boisterous and our quiet rage, this concert features RAW Taiko in collaboration with guest artists Toronto's Jihyun Back and Montreal's Valerie Hongoh, and showcases musical expressions that thoughtfully combine Korean percussion and dance, with taiko.

name: FREQUENCY LIVE 001
description:
A culture-forward rave and community showcase built to elevate emerging DJs and connect scenes across music, gaming, and fashion. 

Featuring performers MAXXX , ARMANI IN ROME, NILA MOON, ZEAH. Expect cinema-style lighting, custom signal-wave visuals, and a live broadcast. 

Beyond the DJ booth we have NXT LVL NEXUS hosting a Mario Kart 8 tournament along side a casual gaming station.

PLETHORA brings a fashion pop-up, and INKEDOUTKICKS will setup a booth full of their exquisite custom shoe designs and to one of you lucky raffle winners will receive a free voucher for a custom pair of your own sneakers! 

This is the start of something big.

name: Moshe Hammer Farewell tour, with Angela Park
description:
Admired for his artistic style, unique interpretations and vibrant tone, Hungarian-born violinist Moshe Hammer was raised in Israel and studied there with Ilona Feher. As a student of Jascha Heifetz he was a medal winner at the Concours Jacques Thibaud in Paris.

Moshe's tours have taken him across North America, Europe, Israel and the Far-East. His performances have consistently energized critics, thrilled audiences and earned respect among his colleagues.

A naturalized Canadian, Moshe has played in concert venues around the world and performed with many symphony orchestras. He has been the founder and leader of the Toronto based chamber group, The Amadeus Ensemble. As a member of Da Camera, he has thrilled audiences in Canada, the US and Europe with regular visits to the Netherlands.

name: Holiday Hills
description:
Holiday Hills opens winter at STACKT market, a space where holiday nostalgia and modern urban energy meet.

Returning with a refreshed approach, this year's festival unveils a new identity, new installations, and a reimagined thematic direction that celebrates the timeless spirit of the holidays in a modern way. The experience invites guests to eat, shop, and play across the site, transformed into an immersive landscape of festive discovery.

From nostalgic sweet treats and mulled wine to live music, curated markets, and playful installations, Holiday Hills transforms STACKT into a reimagined winter wonderland, a space to rediscover the magic of the season and see old traditions come alive in new ways.
